name: @man
description:
Gameplay: Collect all of the gold and both items in each floor to advance. There is no ending, try to get as far as possible! Each enemy has a different method of attack and will chase you down. You can attack enemies in one hit to send them back to the center.

Controls:
Arrow keys to move, space to skip a turn, 1, 2, or 3 to use an item.

Items:
Potion: Heals 1 HP. You cannot have more than 3 HP.
Elixir: Resets attack cooldown.
Bomb: Explodes after 8 turns, damaging those nearby
Portal: Teleport to a random location.
Arrow: Attack all enemies in a direction.
Shield: Protect against the next attack, but you cannot attack until the shield is used up.
